title: BRIEF-Balwin Properties HY HEPS 40 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Balwin Properties HY HEPS 40 Cents

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 08:36)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Balwin Properties HY HEPS 40 Cents Oct 21 (Reuters) - Balwin Properties Ltd : * UNAUDITED INTERIM RESULTS FOR THE SIX MONTHS ENDED 31 AUGUST 2019 * HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE UP 5% TO 40 CENTS PER SHARE * HY EARNINGS PER SHARE UP 4% TO 40 CENTS PER SHARE * HY REVENUE UP 19% TO R1 419 MILLION * NO DIVIDEND WAS DECLARED IN PRIOR INTERIM PERIOD. * BOARD HAS DECLARED AN INTERIM GROSS DIVIDEND OF 11.7 CENTS PER ORDINARY SHARE
